Description.Text: Facilities A safe, a restaurant and a childcare service are available to guests of the hotel. Wireless internet access allows travellers to surf the internet and stay up to date with their communications. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning. A safe and a minibar are also available. Internet access, a TV and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. The accommodation features an indoor pool. Leisure facilities at the hotel include a gym and a sauna. Meals Breakfast can be booked.
